PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2002-19832002-11-21,  ,  IA&ND,  , 
PrecisAcceptance of an Instrument (AMENDMENT OF SURRENDER) wherein the OSOYOOS BAND amends its 1961 Surrender insofar as it applies to Lot 1-4 on Osoyoos Indian Reserve No. 1 in British Columbia, as shown on CLSR Plan 81092, in order to allow for its leasing to a band-owned entreprise for the construction and operation of a manufactured mobile home park.
AttachmentsAttachment
